titleInfo.title: Letter to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has a hole in the text.

mods.abstract: Letter mentions arrival of Mr Whittal and Mr Collins, who are alleged to be travelling without the company's permission. Reports a skirmish between Arabs in alliance with the Turks and the Persians on the Bussora [Basra] side of Bagdat [Baghdad] and that Abdulla Bacha [Pasha] is gathering together a large force of Arabs. Letter also observes that Shaikh Nassir is building up the fortifications of Bushire.
